sprint_goal: Establish secure multi-tenant infrastructure and enable Salla OAuth connection.
key_deliverables: Working Login/Registration; Salla Connect Button; Secure API Foundation
demo_objectives: Show user registration flow and successful Salla OAuth handshake.
success_criteria: JWT authentication working; Salla tokens stored encrypted; Tenants isolated.
risk_factors: Salla API credential verification delays; Vercel environment config issues.
mitigation_strategies: Pre-verify Salla Partner account; Use mock OAuth for local dev.

sprint_goal: Implement robust historical data synchronization and OLAP warehousing.
key_deliverables: ClickHouse Schema; Recursive Data Sync Worker; Historical Import
demo_objectives: Trigger data sync and visualize data arriving in ClickHouse.
success_criteria: Sync job handles 12 months of data without timeout; Rate limits respected.
risk_factors: Serverless timeouts; Salla API Rate Limiting.
mitigation_strategies: Implement QStash recursion; Deploy Redis rate limiter.

sprint_goal: Deliver the interactive dashboard with real-time sales and customer metrics.
key_deliverables: Main Dashboard UI; Sales Charts; KPI Cards; Date Filtering
demo_objectives: Interactive dashboard walkthrough filtering by different date ranges.
success_criteria: Dashboard LCP < 2.5s; Data accuracy verified against Salla dashboard.
mitigation_strategies: Review SQL query plan; Add sorting keys/indices.

sprint_goal: Implement automated abandoned cart detection and email recovery sequences.
key_deliverables: Abandoned Cart Detector; Email Scheduler; Template Engine
demo_objectives: Simulate cart abandonment and receive recovery email.
success_criteria: Emails scheduled correctly; Suppression list respected; Templates render variables.
mitigation_strategies: Domain verification with Postmark; Webhook signature validation.
